description.text: We are excited to announce the release of Horizon Animation Editor version 1.0.0!
This milestone marks the culmination of months of hard work and dedication.
The new version includes a revamped user interface, improved performance,
and a host of new features designed to enhance your animation creation experience.
We can't wait for you to try it out and see the amazing animations you create with it!

bug_fixes.text: none. This is the first release.
